title: 3 BD, Polished kitchen countertops, Oversized closets
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '3', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '1197', 'Address:', '501 E Lake Mead Pkwy', 'Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', 'Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity', 'Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', 'Onsite playground', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Mountain views', 'Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', 'Professional onsite management', 'Oversized closets', 'Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
